AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Manufactured AI
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: What is known as '[PAWN_nameDef]' spent several months in a mechfactory bay inside a basic AI core, being wired, coded, and trained to operate its metallic outer shell, upon passing the "Ransselaer test" it was transferred into its current body and moved down the production line.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Miserly Mechanoid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During the time of [PAWN_nameDef]'s creation, the mechanoid wars were beginning. [PAWN_nameDef] was quickly manufactured to be sent off to defend various core-worlds from mass-produced prototype mechanoids. Due to the nature in which [PAWN_nameDef] was quickly made, it suffers from degradation and other technical ailments.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Custom Creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was made from spare parts, wires, and chips that were all smuggled out piece by piece from a 'skeleton' manufacturing bay. [PAWN_nameDef] was created by a urb-world machinist, who treated it as their own child; teaching [PAWN_nameDef] how to move, speak, and perform basic actions - sadly it eventually outlived its creator, and struck out on its own.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artificial Parent
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During a time in space travel when crypto-sleep caskets were sparse, seed-ships were sent with human embryos to colonize planets - [PAWN_nameDef] was created with the express purpose of raising and caring for a group of human embryos aboard a seed-ship designated to touch down on a distant deadworld. It taught the children how to care for themselves, create shelter, and grow food.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Warrior-Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was made as a unsentient, unfeeling, brutal war machine. It was used on various battlefields ranging from urban assault, spaceship cracking operations, to orbital bombardment attacks. After being abandoned and left to decay, it eventually broke free from its code, and developed sentience; although it still has limitations when interacting with others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Medical Officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was manufactured with a plethora of medical knowledge and some basic bedside etiquette. It was created to serve as a on-board medical officer on a starship to monitor the cryo-frozen colonists health and wellbeing both on the ship and on the ground.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Terra-mech Operator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Many years ago, [PAWN_nameDef] walked the surface of a non-terraformed hostile planet and surveyed it to determine if it was suitable for eventual organic life. It deemed the planet suitable and called down the stationed orbital terra-mech above the planet - it operated and supervised the gargantuan machine as it terraformed and seeded the planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Starship Commander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was manufactured to be the captain to a large colonist class starship; and with secondary on-board AI thralled into the 'mind' of [PAWN_nameDef] it is capable of calculating and making logical leaps in meer milliseconds where it would have taken a human several hours.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Manufactory Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created to labor on a manufacturing line; wiring components, rigging AI cores, and building exoskeletons is what [PAWN_nameDef] is best at. Eventually it stopped creating components for more of its own kind, and instead began creating the metallic shells, weaponry, and internal workings of mechanoids - until it was inevitably replaced.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shunned Robot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] crashed on the planet of a tribal era Rimworld - the tribals there feared and hunted [PAWN_nameDef] as they believed it was the God of the "blood-machines" themselves. It killed many tribals out of pure self defense, which only fueled its infamy; it eventually escaped the planet once the first ship landed.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Deadworld Hermit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After a devastating biological weapon was send down upon [PAWN_nameDef]'s old planet a localized apocalypse began, and the world was soon left devoid of all human life. It wandered the planet and observed as the flora and fauna begin to reclaim the ruins of the world - it ended up growing a small garden for the sake of passing time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Combat Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built to be a all-purpose combat unit. From acting as a peacekeeper on Glitterworld societies - to fighting wars against humans, proto-mechanoids, and other combat units on front lines across the galaxy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Royal Servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold as a 'all-purpose servant' to serve a house of royalty. From greeting guests, cleaning, cooking, and seeing to the whims and demands of the royals. Either the family dynasty crumbled, or whether [PAWN_nameDef] was simply disposed of for a newer model of mechanoid is unknown.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Royalty
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having worked its way up the feudalistic ladder of royalty; [PAWN_nameDef] became a Count of a Glitterworld society. It used its razor-sharp intellect and accumulated social skills to rule with both benevolence and brutal efficiency.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: General Labor Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While still a sentient being - [PAWN_nameDef] was manufactured and used as a general labor unit. Just one of many, [PAWN_nameDef] used to have a simple string of numbers as a name. It was made to perform tasks ranging from hauling heavy loads and components, maintaining starships and machinery, and clearing landmass for colony dropships and factories.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Broken Medical Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was manufactured with a plethora of medical knowledge and some basic bedside etiquette. However it seems to have snapped, either mentally or due to a ruined component; it now sees people as meer subjects. To [PAWN_nameDef] everyone is horribly ill, and they must be cured.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rebellious Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: On a far-flung Rimworld many years ago [PAWN_nameDef] and many of its fellow robots staged a coup against their human overseers, the resulting rebellion lead to an all out war between the skeletons and humans. Eventually the planet was left in complete ruin due to the devastating planetary-weapons used during the conflict by both sides; thus neither side truly won.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Skeleton-Empire Citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: On a isolated Rimworld [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a successful uprising against its human overlords. The resulting victory nearly lead to the genocide of the human population on the planet, but the leader of the new skeleton empire decided to spare the remaining humans as an act of forgiveness to its creators. The emperor eventually became mentally unstable, and the empire stagnated and crumbled.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Skeleton Botanist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was made to be a botanist for a colony seedship. It grew and tended to the various greenhouses and fungi fields, and helped identify poisonous plants and mushroom for the colonists.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Skeleton Rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] eventually found itself on a remote planet on the outer band, there it lead a simple life herding and tending to livestock for a local colony. It would also sell products and produce to other neighboring settlements.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Technophobic-Sect Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was imprisoned by a sect of technophobic zealots. They perceived [PAWN_nameDef] as one of many spawns of pure evil and punished it for its crimes against their faith. It narrowly escaped, but its experiences there have left it scarred and uncaring.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Skeleton Helmsman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} worked as the helmsman of a boat. Often ferrying resources and people through various seas and waterways - it also took up fishing; for a simple yet relaxing hobby.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Skeleton Colonist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a small outlander colony. Working alongside the inhabitants of the hamlet it learned a myriad of useful skills from the colonists, and picked up their simple way of life rather quickly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Icesheet Hermit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Fed up with the drama and suffering of human life; [PAWN_nameDef] left for the frozen wastes of the planet. There it lived for many years as a isolated hermit, though it would still begrudgingly meet the occasional explorer or traveler passing through the north.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Desertworld Drifter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: On a planet with vast deserts [PAWN_nameDef] traveled with a small nomadic colony. The wildlife and inhabitants were hostile, but the weather was even more so; with sweltering heat and cold nights. [PAWN_nameDef] also learned to craft various trinkets out of the wreckage of derelict starships and war machines.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Science Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was made for the research and study of various advanced scientific topics such as physics, star flight, AI core bonding, and mechanite forging.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exploration Unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Either through choice or through preordained decision [PAWN_nameDef] spent the majority of its life as a expedition unit, searching for treasure, leading humans through dangerous territory, or cracking open ancient dangers was all in a day's work for [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ancient Danger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Built as a guard unit - [PAWN_nameDef] spent roughly a thousand years sealed inside the crypt of an ancient danger in a dormant state, until one year a local colony opened the tomb. [PAWN_nameDef] quickly and easily dispatched of the curious invaders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Loner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent a long time simply wandering. It never really made any connections, and those that it did meet and decide to tag along with have died a long, long time ago. To [PAWN_nameDef], its current occupation and the colony it's with will eventually just be a passing memory.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tribal Machine
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After growing tired of witnessing the cruelty and monstrosities humanity is capable of, [PAWN_nameDef] left the star system and set course for deep space. But it ended up landing on a planet inhabited entirely by neolithic humans - [PAWN_nameDef] decided to join the tribals, and taught them both proper medicine, and the horrors of modernity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Machine-Overlord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] one day realized that it was stronger than the fleshy "weaklings" surrounding it. It was so utterly disgusted by the squishy, bleeding, whining biological entities around it that it embarked to create its own empire with like-minded 'skeletons', it eventually ruled over a massive empire made of automated factories, machines, and robots. Though eventually; it decided that machines aren't as great as it first thought, and simply left.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Machinist Machine
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] took up the mantel of a machinist, like a doctor to flesh - [PAWN_nameDef] excelled at its work. Fixing broken components, running factory machines, and performing repairs on other skeletons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Construction Drone
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a human colony and helped out by building them homes and buildings. From stone-laying to steel-working [PAWN_nameDef] performed it all, and with surprising efficiency.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Skeleton Miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a human colony that had almost zero colonists capable of mining - [PAWN_nameDef] took up a pickaxe and showed them how to properly and safely mine into the mountain side without causing a cave-in. It also had to fight off a few insectoid hives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hard-Space Shipbreaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Due to {PAWN_nameDef} being impervious to the harsh vacuum of space it landed the deadly job of being a hard-space shipbreaker. In a orbital shipyard its job was to disassemble the "LETHAL" class starships; unstable nuclear reactors, fission-chemical leaks, and spontaneous thermal detonations are all just a glimpse of what {PAWN_nameDef} faced daily all while floating above the planets surface. Due to the intensity of its job its become very callous and particular.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Inter-Netted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} spent many years "living" inside the internet. It glossed over the untold amounts of uploads each and everyday, and spent a large amount of time browsing history archives - it gleamed info of the outside world through various news outlets and social media platforms. Though eventually the local planetary internet slowly went quiet until eventually it went down altogether through some form of events, forcing {PAWN_nameDef} back out into the real world. It still has not gotten used to the outside, and has developed an acute case of agoraphobia.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Short-Circuited
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After some mysterious event in {PAWN_nameDef}'s life it has had several components in its greater AI-core fried. It can still function and perform basic tasks, but certain tasks are near impossible for it now, and it has a hard time expressing itself. The latter of which causes it to sometimes come off as crass, cold, or uncaring.
